title: Big Toe
description: Forward bends, Inversions, Standing Primary body parts engaged Glutes & Hip Flexors, Lower Back, Shoulders, Spine Stretches hamstrings and calves Activates liver and spleen Relieves stress and anxiety How to perform Big Toe Stand with your feet hip distance wide and parallel. Bend forward from your hips with an exhale. Lengthen your torso as you come down. Hook your big toes with your thumbs and first two fingers. Press your toes into your fingers. Lift halfway and lengthen your torso with an inhale. Fold deeply with an exhale, widening your elbows. Let your head hang.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
